description.@value: Paneer Makhani (Cottage Cheese simmered in rich creamy tomato Gravy) Paneer Makhani is a well known Indian classic gravy. Cubes of cottage cheese are simmered in a creamy tomato sauce with the aromatic Kasoori methi (dried fenugreek leaves). It is ...Read more
